As we develop the Champions Program and work with research groups of different needs and backgrounds, we are constantly learning and adapting the Lesson Series and the shapes and sizes of the program. Here is an archive of the agendas for specific previous cohorts.

2021: CS&S and CSU-COAST (2-month)


Agendas Chapters Slides
1. Openscapes mindset mindset, better science in less time mindset, better science in less time
2. Coding with communities, GitHub with the team coding with communities GitHub for publishing, GitHub for project mgmt intro to coding communities, GitHub clinic, (discovering community tools)
3. Strategies for future us data strategies, coding strategies, team culture data strategies, coding strategies, psychological safety
4. Pathways share & team on/offboarding


2021 NWFSC Cohort #1 (2-month)


Agendas Chapters Slides
1. Openscapes mindset mindset, better science in less time mindset, better science in less time
2. Strategies for future us data strategies, coding strategies data strategies, coding strategies
3. Onboarding to collaborative research GitHub for collaborative research GitHub for collaborative research, pathways to onboarding
4. Psychological safety & pathways share team culture psychological safety


2020 NEFSC Cohort (2-day)

An in-person workshop, where research groups participated as a cohort over a 2 full days. The Workshop agenda with links to slides is in this Google Doc, and identified individually in the following table.

Time Day 1 Day 2
9:00- 9:10 Welcome
9:10- 10:30 Introductions, Openscapes overview, Openscapes mindset Streamlined workflows: Source files & filepaths, Project-oriented workflows, Intro to coding communities
10:30- 11:00 Break
11:00- 12:30 Better science in less time, Pathways Collaborative coding: Discovering community tools
12:30- 1:30 Lunch
1:30- 3:00 Data interlude, Team culture, Codes of conduct Supercharge your research, Pathways preparation
3:00- 3:30 Break
3:30- 4:45 GitHub for publishing, GitHub for project management Pathways share
4:45- 5:00 Closing


Inaugural Cohort 2019: 5-month remote


Agendas Chapters Slides
1. Openscapes overview & mindset overview, mindset overview, mindset
2. Better science in less time better science in less time better science in less time, data interlude
3. Lab culture lab culture, code of conduct lab culture, code of conduct
4. GitHub for the lab GitHub for publishing, GitHub for project management GitHub for publishing, GitHub for project management
5. Streamlined workflows with code source files, filepaths & project oriented workflows source files & file paths; project oriented workflows
6. Mid-series check in x
7. Coding with communities, part 1 coding with communities coding with communities, part 1
8. Coding with communities, part 2 coding with communities, part 2
9. Communicating science openly publishing & discoverability
10. Presentations: Openscapes Case Studies
